SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD B WHERE B.DEL_YN IS NULL AND B.NO <= A.NO) AS ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT NO, TITLE, AUTHOR, RECOMMEND, VIEW_CNT, DATE_FORMAT(APPLY_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS APPLY_FORMAT_DATE FROM BOARD WHERE DEL_YN IS NULL
AND UPPER(AUTHOR) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{val}),'%')
AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{val},'%')
AND (UPPER(AUTHOR) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{val}),'%') OR TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{val},'%'))
ORDER BY APPLY_DATE DESC) A LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
